General.Name: Koryo Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Koryo Electronics Co., Ltd. engages in the production, sale, and import/export of electronic parts and components, and computers and computer peripherals. It also imports/exports electric appliances and components, such as TV sets, video and radio cassette recorders, air conditioners, refrigerators, and microwave ovens; and acts as an agent for related products of domestic and international companies on sales, bids, and quotes. The company provides memory integrated circuits, microprocessors, application specific integrated circuits, distributed and baseband controller components, and other products. Koryo Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 79, Xintai 5th Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 22101
